Name: VentureVerse: Legend of Ulora
About the game: VentureVerse is a Fantasy Action-Adventure game with a focus on adventuring and puzzle-solving, featuring a built-in level editor allowing players to easily create and share their own dungeons. The land of Ulora features a variety of unique, hand-crafted dungeons. Defeat hordes of monsters, solve devious puzzles, meet curious characters and earn your rewards from the Goddess of the realm, Drael! Using the in-built level editor, create your very own dungeons using a huge array of dungeon elements. The simple interface makes it easy to shape your rooms, decorate them with props, add puzzles, traps and much more! Steam Workshop integration makes it extremely easy to share your creations with the world! Once uploaded, the dungeon can be viewed in the in-game VentureVerse menu, or by using any internet browser. Online co-op allows you to share your adventure with another player! In co-op, both players earn the same rewards and progress that they would in single-player. As you explore dungeons, your Portal Stone absorbs Drael's stolen power. The Goddess rewards your help with access to a diverse range of swords, staves, armour, spells and more!
